content: छिद् {c7c} <ab>U.</ab> (छिनत्ति, छिंत्ते, चिच्छेद, अच्छिदत्, अच्छैत्सीत्, अच्छित्त, छेत्तुं, छिन्न) {@--1@} To cut, cut or lop off, hew, mow, tear, pierce, break asunder, rend, split, divide; नैनं छिंदंति शस्त्राणि <ls>Bg. 2. 23</ls>; <ls>R. 12. 80</ls>; <ls>Ms. 4. 69</ls>, <ls n="Ms. 4.">70</ls>; <ls n="Ms.">9. 276</ls>; <ls>Y. 2. 302.</ls> {@--2@} To disturb, interrupt (as sleep). {@--3@} To remove, drive off, destroy, quell, annihilate; तृष्णां छिंद्धि <ls>Bh. 2. 77</ls>; एतन्मे संशयं छिंद्धि मतिर्मे संप्रमुह्यति Mb; राघवो रथमप्राप्तां तामाशां च सुरद्विषां . अर्धचंद्रमुखैर्बाणैश्चिच्छेद कदलीसुखं .. <ls>R. 12. 96</ls>; <ls>Ku. 7. 16.</ls> {@--4@} To take away, remove, deprive of; न नः किंचिद् छिद्यते <ls>Ś. B.</ls> we do not lose anything [<ab>cf.</ab> <ab>L.</ab> {%scindo%}].

छिद् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (At the end of <ab>comp.</ab>) Cutting, dividing, destroying, removing, splitting &c.; श्रमच्छिदामाश्रमपादपानां <ls>R. 5. 6</ls>; पंकच्छिदः फलस्य <ls>M. 2. 8.</ls> {%--<ab>m.</ab>%} The divisor, denominator.
